statements: SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT volunteer_name, phone_number, availability FROM Volunteers WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT volunteer_name, email, address FROM Volunteers;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, email, phone_number FROM Volunteers WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE availability = TRUE AND address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, location FROM organizations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT name FROM organizations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM volunteers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT id, name, join_date FROM volunteers WHERE organization_id = 2 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE organization_id = 3 AND join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT organizations.name, volunteers.name, volunteers.email FROM organizations INNER JOIN volunteers ON organizations.id = volunteers.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE organization_id = 4 AND (join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31');
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM organizations;
SELECT organization_name FROM organizations WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, join_date FROM volunteers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(volunteer_id) AS total_volunteers FROM organizations JOIN volunteers ON organizations.organization_id = volunteers.organization_id GROUP BY organization_name;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE organization_id = 1 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM organizations WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT volunteer_name, join_date FROM volunteers INNER JOIN schedules ON volunteers.volunteer_id = schedules.volunteer_id WHERE schedules.date = '2022-08-31' AND schedules.shift_start > '08:00:00';
SELECT volunteer_name, organization_name, location FROM volunteers INNER JOIN organizations ON volunteers.organization_id = organizations.organization_id WHERE organization_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(volunteer_id) AS num_volunteers FROM volunteers GROUP BY organization_id HAVING COUNT(volunteer_id) >= 3 ORDER BY num_volunteers DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM volunteers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, description FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT tasks.name, tasks.required_volunteers, projects.name FROM tasks INNER JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.id;
SELECT projects.name, COUNT(schedules.id) AS num_volunteers FROM projects LEFT JOIN schedules ON projects.id = schedules.project_id GROUP BY projects.name;

SELECT volunteers.name, projects.name, schedules.date, schedules.start_time, schedules.end_time FROM volunteers INNER JOIN schedules ON volunteers.id = schedules.volunteer_id INNER JOIN projects ON schedules.project_id = projects.id WHERE projects.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Organizations;
SELECT name, location FROM Organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT id, date, start_time, end_time FROM Schedules WHERE volunteer_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Tasks WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Organizations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT Tasks.name, Assignments.schedule_id FROM Tasks JOIN Assignments ON Tasks.id = Assignments.task_id WHERE volunteer_id = 1;

SELECT Volunteers.name, Schedules.date, Schedules.start_time, Tasks.name FROM Volunteers JOIN Assignments ON Volunteers.id = Assignments.volunteer_id JOIN Schedules ON Assignments.schedule_id = Schedules.id JOIN Tasks ON Assignments.task_id = Tasks.id WHERE Schedules.date = '2022-10-15';

SELECT Volunteers.name AS Volunteer, Tasks.name AS Task, Schedules.date AS Schedule_Date, Schedules.start_time AS Start_Time, Schedules.end_time AS End_Time FROM Volunteers JOIN Assignments ON Volunteers.id = Assignments.volunteer_id JOIN Schedules ON Assignments.schedule_id = Schedules.id JOIN Tasks ON Assignments.task_id = Tasks.id WHERE Tasks.name LIKE '%cleanup%' ORDER BY Schedules.date ASC LIMIT 5;
